channel.title: never knows best
channel.description: Recent content on never knows best

item.title: Linear algebra
item.description: $$S_{\mathrm{triangle}}=\frac{1}{2} \begin{vmatrix} x_0 & x_1 & x_2\\ y_0 & y_1 & y_2\\ 1 & 1 & 1 \end{vmatrix}$$ $$V_{\mathrm{tetrahedron}}=\frac{1}{6} \begin{vmatrix} x_0 & x_1 & x_2 & x_3\\ y_0 & y_1 & y_2 & y_3\\ z_0 & z_1 & z_2 & z_3\\ 1 & 1 & 1 & 1 \end{vmatrix}$$ $$\boldsymbol{a}\times\boldsymbol{b}= \begin{vmatrix} x_1 & y_1 & z_1\\ x_2 & y_2 & z_2\\ \boldsymbol i & \boldsymbol j & \boldsymbol k \end{vmatrix}$$

item.title: L'Internationale
item.description: Debout! les damnés de la terre Debout! les forçats de la faim La raison tonne en son cratère, C’est l’éruption de la fin. Du passé faisons table rase Foule esclave, debout! debout! Le monde va changer de base Nous ne sommes rien, soyons tout! Refrain C’est la lutte finale Groupons-nous et demain L’Internationale Sera le genre humain. Il n’est pas de sauveurs suprêmes: Ni dieu, ni césar, ni tribun, Producteurs, sauvons-nous nous-mêmes!

item.title: Manifesto of the Communist Party
item.description: A spectre is haunting Europe - the spectre of communism. All the powers of old Europe have entered into a holy alliance to exorcise this spectre: Pope and Tsar, Metternich and Guizot, French Radicals and German police-spies. Where is the party in opposition that has not been decried as communistic by its opponents in power? Where is the opposition that has not hurled back the branding reproach of communism, against the more advanced opposition parties, as well as against its reactionary adversaries?
